stock

Class StrategyFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • stock.StrategyFactory

  • public class StrategyFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A factory that creates object of Strategy interface. Each method in this factory is responsible for a single strategy class only.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StrategyFactory()

      Returns an object of DollarCostStrategy.
      static Strategy getRegularStrategyObject(java.lang.String tickerSymbol, double amount, double commission, java.time.LocalDateTime dateTime, java.lang.String strategyName)
      Returns an object of RegularStrategy with the given parameters.

    • Method Detail

      • getRegularStrategyObject

        public static Strategy getRegularStrategyObject(java.lang.String tickerSymbol,
                                                double amount,
                                                double commission,
                                                java.time.LocalDateTime dateTime,
                                                java.lang.String strategyName)
        Returns an object of RegularStrategy with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        tickerSymbol - the ticker symbol of the stock.
        amount - the amount worth of stock to be bought.
        commission - the commission to be applied.
        dateTime - the date and time of purchase.
        Returns:
        an object of RegularStrategy.

      • getDollarCostStrategyObject

        public static Strategy getDollarCostStrategyObject(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> tickerWeightMap,
                                                   java.time.LocalDateTime startDate,
                                                   java.time.LocalDateTime endDate,
                                                   int frequency,
                                                   double amount,
                                                   double commission,
                                                   java.lang.String strategyName)
        Returns an object of DollarCostStrategy.
        Parameters:
        tickerWeightMap - mapping of ticker symbol and its weight.
        startDate - the date from which investment commences.
        endDate - the date on which investment ceases.
        frequency - the span of days between two investments.
        amount - the amount for each investment.
        commission - the commission for each transaction
        Returns:
        an object of DollarCostStrategy.
